venue.address_1: rt 228 near Home Depot just off Rt 3 at exit 14
venue.name: Park and Ride Rockland

item.description:
We have volunteered to help out at this event by checking in riders for registration. 

 

MEETING LOCATION: Park and Ride Lot in Rockland

Rt 228 (Hingham St) just of Rt 3 at exit 14

(FOR GPS USE Home Depot -1149 Hingham St)

MEETING TIME: 7 am

730 am kickstands up!!!!!

We will be meeting up there with another Club called Star Touring and riding to Middleboro with them.  

PLEASE DO NOT BE LATE. WE DO NOT WANT TO HOLD UP THE OTHER GROUP WHO INVITED US TO RIDE WITH THEM!!!!! WE WILL LEAVE WITH THEM AT 730 SHARP!!!

 

 Join Vested Interest in K9s, Inc. for a tribute to law enforcement on Sunday, September 11, 2011 

Hog Wild for K9s Charity Motorcycle Ride & BBQ on September 11, 2011  

New Location: Middleboro Elks Club 24 High Street, Middleboro   

New Attraction: Special appearance by the New England Patriots Cheerleaders 2:30pm-4:30pm    

 (Rain date: Sunday, September 18, 2011)

Motorcycle Registration 10am-12pm, Kickstands up at noon sharp, All you can eat BBQ and attractions 2pm-6pm. RIDERS and NON RIDERS INVITED.

This will be an event like no other! A flag raising ceremony will be followed by a two hour scenic motorcycle ride, all you can eat BBQ, live entertainment provided by rock and roll cover band Sound Tower and Groove Juice featuring acoustic and electric performances, check out the latest custom motorcycles by Perewitz Cycle Fab, dunk your favorite police officer in the dunk tank, vendor marketplace, radio station Mix 104.1 Street Team, working dog demonstration, raffles and more.
item.why: Charity event to raise money for bullet proof vests for police dogs

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Hog Wild For K9s
